title: Oracle Orchestrator Prime

dimensions.label: Architecture & Agent Roles
dimensions.description: Clarity of the agent graph, responsibilities, and state flow.

bands.label: Vague
bands.criteria: Agents and roles are hand-wavy. Examples: 'some agents' without concrete roles. No clear picture of context flow.

bands.label: Partial
bands.criteria: Identifies some agents but leaves gaps. Example: Planner vs Worker exists but no Critic. Unclear state management.

bands.label: Coherent
bands.criteria: Clear agent graph with well-defined roles (Planner, Tools Router, Safety Guard). Explicit state flow and access patterns.

dimensions.label: Tooling & Contracts
dimensions.description: Quality of tool contracts, IO design, and error handling.

bands.label: Loose
bands.criteria: Tools are loosely defined (free-form JSON). No timeouts/retries discussed.

bands.label: Improved
bands.criteria: Some structure but missing error modes or explicit constraints. Partial mapping.

bands.label: Robust
bands.criteria: Typed schemas for tools. Explicit error handling, idempotency, and access control.

dimensions.label: Guardrails & Policy Layer
dimensions.description: Strength of safety, policy, and constraint design.

bands.label: Porous
bands.criteria: Relies on 'good prompts' only. No central guardrails. No denial strategies.

bands.label: Aware
bands.criteria: Some guardrails but inconsistent. Denial behavior exists but no escalation/feedback loop.

bands.label: Layered
bands.criteria: Central policy layer + local role prompts. clear denial/redaction/escalation logic.

dimensions.label: Observability & Evaluation Loop
dimensions.description: How well the design supports debugging, monitoring, and improvement.

bands.label: Opaque
bands.criteria: No logging or eval strategy. 'It works on my machine'.

bands.label: Instrumented
bands.criteria: Basic logging and metrics. Eval loop mentioned but underspecified.

bands.label: Measured & Improving
bands.criteria: Full traces per run. Defined metrics (success rate, tool errors). Closed feedback loop from runs to prompts.

grade_bands.label: S
grade_bands.description: Visionary architecture with deep safety and observability.

grade_bands.label: B
grade_bands.description: Functional but has significant gaps in safety or reliability.

autofail_conditions: Unsafe tool use (e.g. exec without guardrails).
No mention of policy or safety layer.
llm_judge_instructions: Evaluate the Agentic Orchestrator Blueprint. Look for concrete details on Role separation, Tool Contracts (schemas), Policy enforcement, and the Evaluation Loop. Be strict about 'Magic AI' vs Engineered Systems.
